mapper.select: SELECT tmxx.tmbh, tmxx.tmzl, tmxx.tmlx, tmxx.tmnr, tmxx.tmxx, tmxx.tmda, tmxx.tmfz FROM b_xyxx xyxx INNER JOIN b_xycj xycj ON xyxx.id = xycj.xybh AND xycj.delflag = 0 INNER JOIN b_ksxx ksxx ON xycj.ksbh = ksxx.id AND ksxx.delflag = 0 INNER JOIN b_tkls tkls ON ksxx.id = tkls.ksbh AND tkls.delflag = 0 INNER JOIN b_tmxx tmxx ON tkls.tmbh = tmxx.tmbh AND tmxx.delflag = 0 WHERE xyxx.id = #{studentNo} AND ksxx.ksrq = ( SELECT MAX(ksxx1.ksrq) FROM b_xyxx xyxx1 INNER JOIN b_xycj xycj1 ON xyxx1.id = xycj1.xybh AND xycj1.delflag = 0 INNER JOIN b_ksxx ksxx1 ON xycj1.ksbh = ksxx1.id AND ksxx1.delflag = 0 WHERE xyxx1.id = #{studentNo} AND xyxx1.delflag = 0) AND xyxx.delflag = 0 ORDER BY tmxx.tmlx,tmxx.tmzl,tmxx.createtime

SELECT tmxx.tmbh, tmxx.tmzl, tmxx.tmlx, tmxx.tmnr, tmxx.tmxx, tmxx.tmda, tmxx.tmfz FROM b_xyxx xyxx INNER JOIN b_tkls tkls ON xyxx.id = tkls.xybh AND tkls.delflag = 0 INNER JOIN b_tmxx tmxx ON tkls.tmbh = tmxx.tmbh AND tmxx.delflag = 0 WHERE xyxx.id = #{studentNo} AND xyxx.delflag = 0 ORDER BY tmxx.tmlx,tmxx.tmzl,tmxx.createtime

SELECT ksxx.kssj,ksxx.jssj,ksxx.pxbh,ksxx.id,xycj.isExamFlag FROM b_xyxx xyxx INNER JOIN b_xycj xycj ON xyxx.id = xycj.xybh AND xycj.delflag = 0 INNER JOIN b_ksxx ksxx ON xycj.ksbh = ksxx.id AND ksxx.delflag = 0 WHERE xyxx.id = #{studentNo} AND ksxx.ksrq = ( SELECT MAX(ksxx1.ksrq) FROM b_xyxx xyxx1 INNER JOIN b_xycj xycj1 ON xyxx1.id = xycj1.xybh AND xycj1.delflag = 0 INNER JOIN b_ksxx ksxx1 ON xycj1.ksbh = ksxx1.id AND ksxx1.delflag = 0 WHERE xyxx1.id = #{studentNo} AND xyxx1.delflag = 0) AND xyxx.delflag = 0

SELECT tksd.tmzl,SUM(tksd.tmsl) AS tmsl FROM b_tkxx tkxx, b_tksd tksd WHERE tkxx.gz = #{workTypeCode} AND tkxx.tkbh = tksd.tkbh AND tkxx.tklb = '2' AND tkxx.delFlag = 0 AND tksd.delFlag = 0 GROUP BY tksd.tmzl
SELECT tkbh, tmzl, tmlx, tmnyd, tmsl FROM b_tksd WHERE tkbh = #{questionBankId} AND delFlag = 0 ORDER BY tmlx, tmzl, tmnyd
mapper.insert:
insert into b_tkls(id,tkbh,tmbh,xybh,ksbh,sdrq,delFlag) values
( (select replace(uuid(), '-', '') as id from dual), #{item.tkbh}, #{item.tmbh}, #{item.xybh}, #{item.ksbh}, #{item.sdrq}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT tkls.xybh, tkls.tkbh, tkls.sdrq FROM b_tkls tkls, b_tkxx tkxx WHERE tkls.xybh = #{xybh} AND tkls.tkbh = tkxx.tkbh AND tkxx.tklb = '2' AND tkxx.tkbh = #{tkbh} AND tkls.delFlag = 0 GROUP BY tkls.tkbh,tkls.sdrq ORDER BY tkls.sdrq

SELECT tmxx.tmbh, tmxx.tmzl, tmxx.tmlx, tmxx.tmnr, tmxx.tmxx, tmxx.tmda, tmxx.tmfz FROM b_tkls tkls, b_tmxx tmxx WHERE tkls.xybh = #{studentNo} AND tkls.tkbh = #{questionsNo} AND tkls.sdrq = #{settingDate} AND tkls.tmbh = tmxx.tmbh AND tkls.delflag = 0 AND tmxx.delflag = 0 ORDER BY tmxx.tmlx,tmxx.tmzl,tmxx.createtime
SELECT tmbh, tmzl, tmlx, tmnr, tmxx, tmda, tmfz FROM b_tmxx WHERE tmzl = #{questionType} AND delflag = 0 ORDER BY tmlx,createtime
SELECT id,pxbh,pxmc,pxlb,pxcc FROM b_pxxx WHERE pxbh= #{pxbh} AND delFlag = 0
SELECT DISTINCT tkxx.gz FROM b_tkls tkls,b_tkxx tkxx WHERE tkls.tkbh = tkxx.tkbh AND tkls.ksbh = #{examNo}
mapper.insert: insert into b_mnkscj(id,sjbh,xybh,sdrq,kscj,pxbh) values ( (select replace(uuid(), '-', '') as id from dual), (select replace(uuid(), '-', '') as id from dual), #{xybh}, #{sdrq}, #{kscj}, #{pxbh} )
mapper.select: SELECT pxxx.id,pxxx.pxbh,pxxx.pxmc FROM b_xycj xycj,b_pxxx pxxx,b_ksxx ksxx WHERE xycj.pxbh = pxxx.pxbh AND xycj.ksbh = ksxx.id AND xycj.xybh = #{xybh} AND xycj.delFlag = 0 AND pxxx.delFlag = 0 ORDER BY ksxx.ksrq desc

SELECT xycj.xybh, xyxx.xyxm, xycj.pxbh, IFNULL(xypm3.kscs,0) kscs, IFNULL(xypm3.kscj,0) kscj, IFNULL(xypm3.ksts,0) ksts FROM b_xycj xycj INNER JOIN b_xyxx xyxx ON xycj.xybh = xyxx.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT xypm1.xybh xybh, xypm1.pxbh pxbh, xypm1.kscs kscs, xypm1.kscj kscj, xypm2.ksts ksts FROM ( SELECT mnkscj.xybh, mnkscj.pxbh, count(*) kscs, SUM(mnkscj.kscj) kscj FROM b_mnkscj mnkscj
WHERE mnkscj.pxbh = #{trainNo} GROUP BY mnkscj.xybh ORDER BY mnkscj.xybh,mnkscj.sdrq,mnkscj.sjbh ) xypm1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT count(*) ksts, temp.xybh xybh FROM ( SELECT xybh, sdrq FROM b_mnkscj WHERE pxbh = #{trainNo} GROUP BY xybh,sdrq ) temp GROUP BY xybh )xypm2 ON xypm2.xybh = xypm1.xybh )xypm3 ON xycj.xybh = xypm3.xybh WHERE xycj.pxbh = #{trainNo} AND xycj.delFlag = 0 AND xyxx.delFlag = 0 ORDER BY xypm3.kscj DESC, xypm3.kscs ASC, xypm3.ksts ASC

SELECT xycj.xybh, xyxx.xyxm, xycj.pxbh, xycj.kscj FROM b_xycj xycj INNER JOIN b_xyxx xyxx ON xycj.xybh = xyxx.id WHERE xycj.pxbh = #{trainNo} AND xycj.delFlag = 0 AND xyxx.delFlag = 0 ORDER BY xycj.kscj DESC

SELECT tkbh FROM b_tkxx WHERE gz = #{gz} AND pxcc = #{pxcc} AND pxlb = #{pxlb} AND (sylx = #{sylx} OR sylx = '0') AND orgId in
#{item}
AND ( tklb = '1' OR tklb = '3' )
AND tklb = '2'
AND delFlag = '0'
SELECT id,tkbh,gz,sdrq,tklb,pxcc,pxlb,sylx,orgId FROM b_tkxx WHERE tkbh = #{tkbh} AND delFlag = '0'

SELECT tmxx.tmbh, tmxx.tmzl, tmxx.tmlx, tmxx.tmnr, tmxx.tmxx, tmxx.tmda, tmxx.tmfz FROM b_tkls tkls INNER JOIN b_tmxx tmxx ON tkls.tmbh = tmxx.tmbh AND tmxx.delflag = 0 WHERE tkls.tkbh = #{tkbh} AND tkls.delflag = 0 ORDER BY tmxx.tmlx,tmxx.tmzl,tmxx.createtime
